mainText:
REST IN PEACE. My dear friend, you made this tech world what it is now. 
You build a company with an amazing future my friend. We will miss you! And all the geeks, nerds, and mac users in the world love you very much. 
I'm one of your biggest fans, my friend. You'll always be in my heart as the 
man of the hour :'( You will be missed dearly. A Genius in the making and one of the greatest innovators of technology 
of 2 Generations! R.I.P Steve Jobs.
header: Rest in Peace my dear friend :'(
author: Anonymous
